sub_title: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data
summary: I am an ambitious and passionate Lead Data Engineer with a master in Computer Science. My drive is to create impact in organisations by applying a structured approach to make them more data-driven. As a Lead Data Engineer and Analytics Translator I overlook challenges from both a consulting perspective as from a technical perspective. My current experience covers multiple industries: Consultancy, Utilities, Telecom, Transport, Insurances, Marketing, and Retail.

certifications.name: Fundamentals of the Databricks Lakehouse Platform
DAT207x Analyzing and Visualizing Data with Power BI
DAT202.2x Implementing Real-Time Analytics with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight
DAT202.1x Processing Big Data with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight
DAT203x Data Science and Machine Learning Essentials
70-467: Designing Business Intelligence Solutions with Microsoft SQL Server
Predictive Modeling with SAS® Enterprise Miner 7™
70-466: Implementing Data Models and Reports with Microsoft SQL Server 2012
70-463: Implementing a Data Warehouse with Microsoft SQL Server 2012

projects.title: Eneco
projects.description: Eneco, as grid operator for heat networks for over 400,000 consumers, faces challenges on safety and maintenance. Roy took up the role of product owner of a team of 4 FTE. He was able to realise to create an innovative application for monitoring the entire heat-grid, and related maintenance in real-time. He was also responsible for budget & delivery management. The application is currently business critical to daily maintenance operations, improving safety and efficiency.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: Transavia
projects.description: Transavia is a Dutch airline serving over 9,000,000 passengers on a yearly basis. Roy acted as data scientist and software engineer leading a team helping the company become more data-driven. He supervised the deployment of a new data visualisation tool (PowerBI), tracked the customer journey in order to make data-driven decisions to better serve the customer, and giving a number of training courses in data-driven work. He realised operational savings and improved decision making.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: KPN Consumenten Markt
projects.description: Roy supported and advised KPN Consumer Marker to implement an advanced Forecast application in IBM Cognos TM1. The application can forecast the service revenue of KPN Consumer Market. The forecasting algorithm differentiates between all proposition on KPN and also takes into account different variables.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: NS (Groep, Reizigers, Stations Retailbedrijf, Hispeed)
projects.description: Roy was responsible for the technical implementation of the analytical NS KIM 2.0 project. Analytical insight of different divisions within NS (NS Groep, NS Reizigers, NS Staions Retailbedrijf, NS Hispeed) were combined in about 50 dashboard reports. Roy designed the datamodels, datawarehouse (SQL Server/ T-SQL), ETL processes (SSIS) and implemented the reports (SSRS).

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: NS Stations Retailbedrijf
projects.description: Roy implemented a ROI tool to predict the ROI of promotional campaigns. The tool gives insights in the cost and benefits allocation of the promotional campaign. To provide the ROI tool with data, Roy implemented ETL processes to store weekly transactional data in a small data warehouse.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: N.V. Nederlandse Gasunie
projects.description: Roy de Groot worked together in a team to implement a new Microsoft BI system to replace the SAP BW system. The new BI system uses SQL Server 2012 together with the Avanade ETL Framework. The project included the build of SSIS packages, SSAS cubes and Excel Pivot table reports.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: Avensus
projects.description: For Avensus, Roy developed a reporting service for the new management system. The implemented solution provides SQL Server 2008 R2 Reporting Service report models from which the client can create reports themself with Report Builder 1.0.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

projects.title: Kiwa Register
projects.description: Roy implemented a SSIS package to Extract, Transform and finally Load data from a source system to a destination system. The SSIS package contains data conversions and data look-ups to process updates and insertions to the destination. Additionally, he developed some stored procedures to insert and update new data to the destination system.

contributors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

publications.name: Data Mining for Tweet Sentiment Classification

authors.headline: Lead Data Engineer | Data Architect | Tech Trainer | Creating Impact with Data

profile_positions.description: As a Trainer & expert I provide training in Data Engineering, CI/CD, Git, Python Infrastructure as Code etc and interview applicants on their technical data knowledge for a role in the Data Engineering & Data Science field.
profile_positions.title: Tech Trainer & Owner

profile_positions.description: I'm responsible for technical interviews with potential candidates in data analysis, engineering, science and machine learning field.
profile_positions.title: Tech Interviewer @ Cluster Data

profile_positions.description: For the Data Talent Incubator program, I gave the masterclass CI/ CD which is a full day training, in which the participants learned the theory of DevOps, CI/ CD, and mastered CI/ CD with practical assignments.
profile_positions.title: Tech Trainer @ Harvest

profile_positions.description: Responsible for two trainings in the Data Engineer and Machine Learning Traineeships
profile_positions.title: Tech Trainer @ Aurai

profile_positions.description:
As the owner of The Big Data Consultancy, I believe in creating significant impact with data in organisations by combining technology and consultancy. Supporting organisations in creating data valuable from different roles: 
- Tech & Data Leadership
- Data Consultancy
- Data Architecture
- Data Engineering
- Data Science
- Data Advisory & Assessments
profile_positions.title: Lead Data Engineer/ Data Architect/ Data Advisor & Owner

profile_positions.description: As senior Data Engineer in first the Central Data Factory team I was responsible for implementing the generic and specific processes of ingesting data to the Core Data Platform of Schiphol. After a couple of months, I got promoted to the senior Data Engineer of the Core Data Platform itself. In the the Core Data Platform I was responsible for implementation of the Core Data Platform, to process streaming data near-realtime with a Kafka, Spark, Scala and Databricks technology stack.
profile_positions.title: Senior Big Data Engineer @ Royal Schiphol Group

profile_positions.description: In the first Philips project, I was responsible for the architecture and implementation of the technical solution to profile healthcare data. In my second project, I was responsible for the technical design of the advisory report.
profile_positions.title: Lead Data Engineer @ Philips

profile_positions.description: As Technology Officer I am in charge for the right technical implementations at the Navara.ai projects. I am also responsible for setting up the learning paths and knowledge building within Navara.ai.
profile_positions.title: CTO & Lead Data Science/ Engineering Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a Data Science Consultant I support companies in becoming more data-driven. As a Product Owner I managed multiple stakeholders in the proces of implementing a data-driven platform at a Dutch energy company. Besides my Product Owner responsibilities, I was responsible for the backend API which provided a fast calculation of an energy model.

Technologies used: Kafka, Python, R, SQL, API, Azure, AWS, IBM Watson
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Engineering & Science Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As an Advanced Analytics Consultant, I applied my experience and knowledge to make Transavia more data-driven. By building data driven applications with "state of the art" technologies as python, flask Roy enabled Transavia to use data in their daily operation. Besides building different data driven applications, I played a key position in rolling out Power BI through the whole organisation.

Technologies used: Python, R, SQL, Data Engineering, Power BI, API's, C#.NET
profile_positions.title: Senior Advanced Analytics Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As a Technology Analytics Consultant, I was responsible for the architecture and implementation of the data platform for multiple clients though the Netherlands. I created sustainable impact with building different Data Analytics capabilities for multiple clients: NS, Goede Doelen Loterijen, Achmea and KPN. At KPN I have build a forecasting capability to forecast their whole mobile phone contract portfolio.

Technologies used: Python, SQL, Data Engineering, Data warehousing, Interactive Dashboarding
profile_positions.title: Technology Analytics Consultant

profile_positions.description:
With my graduation project/ Master's thesis about a Twitter sentiment analysis, I took my first steps in the Data world. Applying the latest technologies at that moment, R in combination with Microsoft Stream Analytics and SQL Server, I was able to create a data driven application for Avanade. After my Master, I worked as Data & Analytics Consultant at Avanade Netherlands. As part of the Avanade Data & Analytics team, I implemented several Data Analytics solutions at different client project: Kiwa Register, Avensus and Gasunie.

Technologies used: SQL, Data Engineering, Reporting
profile_positions.title: Data Analytics Intern & Consultant

profile_positions.description:
During my study, I supported the system developers with the development of a new extra-net for intermediaries and also setting up testing methods to guarantee the quality. Beside these activities I resolved several IT issues for the website and existing extra-net.

Technologies used: SQL, ASP.NET, HTML, CSS, Javascript
profile_positions.title: Software/ Data Engineer
